item.title: Joelle add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Joelle add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Joelle add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Joelle add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Joelle add a quote by Ian McEwan
item.description: "Finally, you had to measure yourself by other people - there really was nothing else. every now and then, quite unintentionally, someone taught you something about yourself." -- Ian McEwan

item.title: Joelle add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Joelle add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Joelle add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Joelle add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Joelle add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Any asshole can chase a skirt, art takes discipline." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Joelle add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Joelle add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description:
"Do you hate people?
I don't hate them...I just feel better when they're not around." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Joelle add a quote by Anne Sexton
item.description: "Watch out for intellect, because it knows so much it knows nothing and leaves you hanging upside down, mouthing knowledge as your heart falls out of your mouth." -- Anne Sexton

item.title: Joelle add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "All colors made me happy: even gray. My eyes were such that literally they Took photographs. " -- Vladimir Nabokov
